verses.verse: Therefore <S%G1352><s%> you are <S%G1488><s%> inexcusable, <S%G379><s%> O man, <S%G444><s%> whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> you are <S%G1488><s%> that judge: <S%G2919><s%> for wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3757><s%> you judge <S%G2919><s%> another, <S%G2087><s%> you condemn <S%G2632><s%> yourself; <S%G4572><s%> for you that judge <S%G2919><s%> do <S%G4238><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> things.

But we are sure <S%G1492><s%> that the judgment <S%G2917><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is according <S%G2596><s%> to truth <S%G225><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> them which commit <S%G4238><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> things.

And think <S%G3049><s%> you this, <S%G5124><s%> O man, <S%G444><s%> that judge <S%G2919><s%> them which do <S%G4238><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> things, and do <S%G4160><s%> the same, <S%G846><s%> that you shall escape <S%G1628><s%> the judgment <S%G2917><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> despise <S%G2706><s%> you the riches <S%G4149><s%> of his goodness <S%G5544><s%> and forbearance <S%G463><s%> and long-suffering; <S%G3115><s%> not knowing <S%G50><s%> that the goodness <S%G5543><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> leads <S%G71><s%> you to repentance? <S%G3341><s%>

But after <S%G2596><s%> your hardness <S%G4643><s%> and impenitent <S%G279><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> treasure <S%G2343><s%> up to yourself <S%G4572><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%> against <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of wrath <S%G3709><s%> and revelation <S%G602><s%> of the righteous <S%G1341><s%> judgment <S%G1341><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>
Who <S%G3739><s%> will render <S%G591><s%> to every <S%G1538><s%> man according <S%G2596><s%> to his deeds: <S%G2041><s%>

To them who by patient <S%G5281><s%> continuance <S%G5281><s%> in well <S%G18><s%> doing <S%G2041><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> for glory <S%G1391><s%> and honor <S%G5092><s%> and immortality, <S%G861><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life: <S%G2222><s%>

But to them that are contentious, <S%G1537><s%> <S%G2052><s%> and do not obey <S%G544><s%> the truth, <S%G225><s%> but obey <S%G3982><s%> unrighteousness, <S%G93><s%> indignation <S%G2372><s%> and wrath, <S%G3709><s%>

Tribulation <S%G2347><s%> and anguish, <S%G4730><s%> on every <S%G3956><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> that does evil, <S%G2556><s%> of the Jew <S%G2453><s%> first, <S%G4412><s%> and also <S%G2532><s%> of the Gentile; <S%G1672><s%>

But glory, <S%G1391><s%> honor, <S%G5092><s%> and peace, <S%G1515><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G3956><s%> that works <S%G2038><s%> good, <S%G18><s%> to the Jew <S%G2453><s%> first, <S%G4412><s%> and also <S%G2532><s%> to the Gentile: <S%G1672><s%>
For there is no <S%G3756><s%> respect <S%G4382><s%> of persons <S%G4382><s%> with God. <S%G2316><s%>

For as many <S%G3745><s%> as have sinned <S%G264><s%> without <S%G460><s%> law <S%G460><s%> shall also <S%G2532><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> without <S%G460><s%> law: <S%G460><s%> and as many <S%G3745><s%> as have sinned <S%G264><s%> in the law <S%G3551><s%> shall be judged <S%G2919><s%> by the law; <S%G3551><s%>

(For not the hearers <S%G202><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> are just <S%G1342><s%> before <S%G3844><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> but the doers <S%G4163><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> shall be justified. <S%G1344><s%>

For when <S%G3752><s%> the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> not the law, <S%G3551><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> by nature <S%G5449><s%> the things contained in the law, <S%G3551><s%> these, <S%G3778><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> not the law, <S%G3551><s%> are a law <S%G3551><s%> to themselves: <S%G1438><s%>

Which <S%G3748><s%> show <S%G1731><s%> the work <S%G2041><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> written <S%G1123><s%> in their hearts, <S%G2588><s%> their conscience <S%G4893><s%> also <S%G4828><s%> bearing <S%G4828><s%> witness, <S%G4828><s%> and their thoughts <S%G3053><s%> the mean <S%G3342><s%> while accusing <S%G2723><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> else <S%G2532><s%> excusing <S%G626><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another; <S%G240><s%>)

In the day <S%G2250><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> shall judge <S%G2919><s%> the secrets <S%G2927><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> by Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to my gospel. <S%G2098><s%>
Behold, <S%G2396><s%> you are called <S%G2028><s%> a Jew, <S%G2453><s%> and rest <S%G1879><s%> in the law, <S%G3551><s%> and make <S%G2744><s%> your boast <S%G2744><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%>
And know <S%G1097><s%> his will, <S%G2307><s%> and approve <S%G1381><s%> the things that are more excellent, <S%G1308><s%> being instructed <S%G2727><s%> out of the law; <S%G3551><s%>
And are confident <S%G3982><s%> that you yourself <S%G4572><s%> are a guide <S%G3595><s%> of the blind, <S%G5185><s%> a light <S%G5457><s%> of them which are in darkness, <S%G4655><s%>

An instructor <S%G3810><s%> of the foolish, <S%G878><s%> a teacher <S%G1320><s%> of babes, <S%G3516><s%> which have <S%G2192><s%> the form <S%G3446><s%> of knowledge <S%G1108><s%> and of the truth <S%G225><s%> in the law. <S%G3551><s%>

You therefore <S%G3767><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> teach <S%G1321><s%> another, <S%G2087><s%> teach <S%G1321><s%> you not yourself? <S%G4572><s%> you that preach <S%G2784><s%> a man should not steal, <S%G2813><s%> do you steal? <S%G2813><s%>

You that say <S%G3004><s%> a man should not commit <S%G3431><s%> adultery, <S%G3431><s%> do you commit <S%G3431><s%> adultery? <S%G3431><s%> you that abhor <S%G948><s%> idols, <S%G1497><s%> do you commit <S%G2416><s%> sacrilege? <S%G2416><s%>
You that make <S%G2744><s%> your boast <S%G2744><s%> of the law, <S%G3551><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> breaking <S%G3847><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> dishonor <S%G818><s%> you God? <S%G2316><s%>
For the name <S%G3686><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is blasphemed <S%G987><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> you, as it is written. <S%G1125><s%>

For circumcision <S%G4061><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> profits, <S%G5623><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you keep <S%G4238><s%> the law: <S%G3551><s%> but if <S%G1437><s%> you be a breaker <S%G3848><s%> of the law, <S%G3551><s%> your circumcision <S%G4061><s%> is made <S%G1096><s%> uncircumcision. <S%G203><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> the uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> keep <S%G5442><s%> the righteousness <S%G1345><s%> of the law, <S%G3551><s%> shall not his uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> be counted <S%G3049><s%> for circumcision? <S%G4061><s%>

And shall not uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> which is by nature, <S%G5449><s%> if it fulfill <S%G5055><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> you, who <S%G3588><s%> by the letter <S%G1121><s%> and circumcision <S%G4061><s%> do transgress <S%G3848><s%> the law? <S%G3551><s%>

For he is not a Jew, <S%G2453><s%> which is one outwardly; <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5318><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> is that circumcision, <S%G4061><s%> which is outward <S%G1722><s%> in the flesh: <S%G4561><s%>

But he is a Jew, <S%G2453><s%> which is one inwardly; <S%G1722><s%> <S%G2927><s%> and circumcision <S%G4061><s%> is that of the heart, <S%G2588><s%> in the spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and not in the letter; <S%G1121><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> praise <S%G1868><s%> is not of men, <S%G444><s%> but of God. <S%G2316><s%>
